mapper.select: SELECT ol.id, ol.operate_emp_id AS operateEmpId, ol.operate_time AS operateTime, ol.class_name AS className, ol.method_name AS methodName, ol.method_params AS methodParams, ol.return_value AS returnValue, ol.cost_time AS costTime, e.name AS operateEmpName FROM operate_log ol LEFT JOIN emp e ON ol.operate_emp_id = e.id ORDER BY ol.operate_time DESC
